progetto.view.gui

Class GamePaneController

  • java.lang.Object
    • progetto.view.gui.AbstractStateController
      • progetto.view.gui.GamePaneController

  • public class GamePaneController
extends AbstractStateController
    this is the class that handles the game fxml. This class is only instanced by javafx, this mean that must have a default constructor.
    Author:
    Federica

      private void addPlayerBoard(int i)
      show the playerboard of the user or the playerboard of the player 0 if the user is not a player
      void onPreShow()
      controllers can implement this, it is called every time the associated FXML is called

      set up this object, it is equivalent to a constructor since there is no access to it

      add and remove components according to the state of the game
